EN: When you play "Assault Thesis", gain 35 Keyflare for each 1 Arithmetica Cost of the drawn card.

EN: Whenever you unleash a Posse, Ramona gains +50% Temporary Crit. Rate.\nReleasing Ramona's Exalt "Mundus Decree" shuffles 1 <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:"Insight"> into the Draw Pile.

CN: 「穿刺之枪」易伤回合数 +1，基础伤害 +100%，力量加成倍数提高 1。

CN: 「七艺，传承美德」获得的护盾提高 20%， 若自身处于脆弱状态，「七艺，传承美德」额外获得 33% 的护盾。

CN: 「不定壁垒」获得的护盾提高 28%，获得等同于攻击力 [Arg1]% 的力量（效果随「不定壁垒」的等级提高）。
EN: Shield gained from "Unstable Barrier" increases by 28%; when played, gain <PowerIconKeywords:STR> equal to [Arg1]% of Ogier's ATK. (Percentage scales with "Unstable Barrier" level.)

CN: <OverLimitUtlSkillKeywords:超限爆发>：获得的护盾提高 200%，奥吉尔造成的伤害次数 +1，持续 3 回合。
EN: <OverLimitUtlSkillKeywords:Over-Exaltation>: Final Shield gained increases by 200%. For the next 3 turns, Ogier deals 1 extra hit whenever he deals DMG.

CN: 「桀骜之刃」视为「打击」。萝坦的「打击」基础伤害提高 30%。
EN: "Blade of Defiance" becomes a Strike Command. The Base DMG of Lotan's Strike Commands increase by 30%.

CN: 「恣睢之浪」视为「打击」，获得的力量翻倍。
EN: "Tides of Hubris" becomes a Strike Command, and the <PowerIconKeywords:STR> gained from it is doubled.

CN: 「混沌之兽」造成的伤害次数+1 ，额外将 2 张附加消耗与虚无的「基础打击」置入手中。

CN: <OverLimitUtlSkillKeywords:超限爆发>：对所有敌人额外追加 1 次 15% 目标最大生命的固定伤害。本场战斗中「混沌之兽」的基础伤害提高 100%。
EN: <OverLimitUtlSkillKeywords:Over-Exaltation>: Deal <RealDamage:Fixed DMG> to each enemy equal to 15% of their Max HP; the Base DMG of "Beast of Chaos" increases by +100% until end of battle.

CN: 「外域手术」虚弱回合数提高 1，治疗量提高 33%。
EN: "Outer Surgery" inflicts 1 more turn of <WeaknessIconKeywords:Weakness>, and its HP recovery increases by 33%.

CN: 「等价交换」基础回复生命和弃牌回复生命效果提高 20%，每弃掉 1 张牌，额外回复生命同时并获得等量的护盾。
EN: The Base HP recovered from "Equivalent Exchange" increases by 20%. For each card it discards, recover another +20% and gain that much Shield.

CN: 「理性，真理与现实」回复生命 +25%，造成的狂气对朵尔也生效。
EN: The HP recovered from Doll's Exalt "Rationality, Truth, and Reality" increases by 25%, and it can also increase Doll's Aliemus.

CN: <OverLimitUtlSkillKeywords:超限爆发>：回合开始时回复等同于朵尔 [Arg1]% 体质的生命，持续 3 回合。（效果随「理性，真理与现实」的等级提升）

CN: ·朵尔每拥有 1 点狂气回充等级属性，就使「外域手术」与「等价交换」回复生命效果提高 0.5%。
EN: For every 1 Aliemus Regen Level Doll has, the HP recovered from "Outer Surgery" and "Equivalent Exchange" increases by 0.5%.

CN: ·奥吉尔每拥有 1% 黑印掉落属性，「七艺，传承美德」获得的临时力量就提高 3%。
EN: For every 1% Sigil Yield provided by Ogier, the Temporary STR gained from his Exalt "Seven Arts and Virtues" increases by 3%.

CN:
演绎法是一种逻辑推理，只有掌握了正确的前提，才能得出准确的结论。
在成为调查员前，拉蒙娜一直在使用演绎法来认知世界。
进行了足够多的冒险后，也许她会开始考虑使用归纳法吧。
EN: Deduction is a form of logical reasoning; only by mastering the correct premise can one arrive at an accurate conclusion.\nBefore becoming an investigator, Ramona had been using deduction to understand the world.\nAfter experiencing enough adventures, perhaps she will begin to consider using induction.

EN: Increase Ramona's Aliemus by <Energy:[Energy:Arg1]>.\n<ExaltIconKeywords:Rouse>: The first 3 times you play a Ramona card each turn, recover 1 Arithmetica.

CN:
哲学是一个没有正确答案的学科。
它是一条源自文明起点的河流，在不同的河段，人类向其中倾倒了不同的河水。
而她正在挖掘属于自己的河道。
也许，她在未来某日能够参透自己的存在本质；也许，这一天永远不会到来。
EN:
Philosophy is a discipline without definitive answers.
It is a river that originates from the dawn of civilization, into which humanity has poured different waters along its course.
She is digging her own channel.
Perhaps one day she will uncover the essence of her existence; perhaps that day will never come.

倒不是想玩什么骑士游戏，只是在目睹了养父的铺张与挥霍后，少女决定为可能到来的破产做准备。
「当女王护卫的报酬，会比警局的薪水高吧？」
EN: When Ramona was ten years old, she expressed her wish to receive battle training.\nIt wasn't about playing some knightly games, but after witnessing her adoptive father's extravagance and waste, the girl decided to prepare for the possible bankruptcy ahead.\n"Surely the pay for being a queen's guard would be higher than the salary at the police station, right?"

CN:
学生们回避着与拉蒙娜对视。
坊间传言，那只青色的眼睛能够看穿内心，一切谎言在拉蒙娜眼前都无所遁形。甚至有人说，她取下单片眼镜之日，就是神明降临之时。
「你别听那些学长瞎猜，戴眼镜只是为了方便阅读。」
「我可不是什么最新款测谎仪，这种程度的推演，不是很简单吗？」
EN:
The students avoided making eye contact with Ramona.
Rumor has it that her azure eye can see through the heart, and all lies are laid bare before her. Some even say that the day she removes her monocle will be the day of the gods' arrival.
"Don't listen to those seniors guessing randomly; wearing glasses is just for easier reading."
"I'm not some high-tech lie detector; this level of deduction isn't very complicated, is it?"

CN:
奥吉尔的记忆因融蚀现象而支离破碎。
他记得舞会上的欢笑，却忘记了舞会主角的姓名；他记得自己在骑士团受训，却不知道大公为何让年幼的他成为骑士；他记得自己葬身铁骑之下，却无法记起自己所守护的是怎样的笑容。
没人能苛责他，他已经做到了骑士应尽的一切责任——包括为了守护的意志而献出生命。
EN: Ogier's memories are fragmented due to the Dissolution Phenomenon.\nHe remembers the laughter at the ball but forgets the name of the ball's protagonist; he remembers his training in the knight order but does not know why the duke appointed him as a knight at such a young age; he remembers perishing under the iron cavalry but cannot recall whose smile he was protecting.\nNo one could blame him. He had fulfilled all the responsibilities of a knight—including sacrificing his life for the will to protect.

CN:
「奥吉尔真是好孩子，不如长大后你成为我女儿的骑士吧——她很喜欢你。」
「子爵家的小孩啊？骑士团可不会因为年幼就减轻训练的哦。」
「干得不错嘛！看样子，奥吉尔未来会由公主亲自册封吧。」
「不要后退，守住行宫！不要让任何人靠近公主！」
「谢谢你，奥吉尔……够了，让我来保护你吧……」
EN:
"Ogier is such a good boy. Why not become my daughter's knight when you grow up? She really likes you."
"A child of the Viscount's household, huh? The knights won't go easy on you just because you're young."
"Well done! It seems Ogier might be personally knighted by the princess in the future."
"Don't retreat! Hold the palace and don't let anyone near the princess!"
"Thank you, Ogier... That's enough. Let me protect you instead..."

只有与他共同作战过的人才知道，那无形之物能凝结成何等坚实的壁垒。
EN: After becoming an Awakener, Ogier formed a stable symbiosis with the amorphous black substance.\nThose who witnessed the horrors of Dissolution often feel tense around Ogier.\nOnly those who have fought alongside him know how solid that invisible barrier can be.

EN: Her pectoral fins can carve out a channel, and her tail fin is powerful enough to smash a harbor.\nWith no one left to fight, the giant whale slumbers in Chaos, entrusting the Planet to new life.

千万年的孤寂中，那人的出现犹如深海中乍现的幽光，点燃了沉寂已久的海床。
为了一场公平的对决，萝坦甘愿屈居于人类的形体中，暗暗等待对手的成长——她渴望一场酣畅的战斗，已经太久太久了。

EN: Accustomed to walking in a human body, Lotan spent a long time searching for a weapon that suited her.\nEven now, she doesn't believe these giant swords are a good match for her and merely makes do with them.

除了最古老的混沌外，没有东西能让海水与火焰融合交织。
你大可去找，去印证。去追寻沙漠尖塔，去寻找海底迷城，去攀越无垠群山。
我向你保证，没有东西比萝坦更加古老。
EN: Besides the most ancient Chaos, nothing can fuse seawater with flames.\nGo and search to verify. Chase the desert spires, seek the lost underwater city, and climb the boundless mountains.\nI assure you, nothing is older than Lotan.

她向学生们解释时，仍保持着面无表情，大家也分不清朵尔教授是不是又在开玩笑了。
真是可怕的幽默感。

理性决定了她的视物角度，真理构筑了她的思维广度，现实则束缚了她的道德尺度。
对这名不世天才而言，科学，亦是一种哲学。

有人固执地认为，身体与灵魂应是永恒的一体；也有人害怕失去肉体后，彷徨不定的神智将走向毁灭。

CN:
无中生有并非科学的领域。
朵尔一直是如此相信的，宇宙、人类、乃至融蚀现象，万物皆有起源，事事皆需代价。
「所以关于点石成金技术的研发，朵尔小姐您看……」
「研发成功的可能性和你毕业论文的含金量一样，都是零。」
EN:
Creating something from nothing is not within the realm of science.
Doll has always believed this: the universe, humanity, and even Dissolution all have origins and come with costs.
"So regarding the research and development of the transmutation technique, Miss Doll, what do you think..."
"The probability of successful research and development is as null as the value of your thesis."
